hero.core_tension: Depict the decision tension between protecting headline price (straight 20% markdown) and using app-linked incentives (5% cashback or 0% BNPL) while judging weekly cohort conversion and AOV across a holiday test window.
hero.setting: Hybrid studio–pop-up corner: matte concrete floor, warm wood display plinths, soft branded backdrop; minimal retail clutter, clean negative space.
hero.persona: Operator duo — brand analyst (data-forward) + pop-up manager (field operator) collaborating with a studio art director.
hero.action: Three-quarter overhead angle of the duo leaning over printed cohort cards and physical product samples; one points while the other arranges translucent cohort stacks.
hero.urgency_symbol: Timing implied by converging light beams and a faint pulsing rim on a display plane (symbolic cadence, not a literal clock).
props: printed cohort cards with tags (S1 testing: cashback vs BNPL vs markdown)
loyalty sample cards and on-site sign-up token mockups (S2/S3)
product sample boxes and annotated price tags
hero.lighting: Polished editorial lighting with confident highlights, directional rim light, and generous clean negative space.
hero.mood: Precise, collaborative, confident — anticipatory timing without panic.
hero.alt: Two operators plan a cohort test in a studio-pop-up; converging light implies time pressure.

signal_map.structure: Concentric arcs and radial lattice that map visitor→loyalty→purchase flows; layered translucent planes to show cohorts over time.
elements: tokens for visitor cohorts (S1, S2, S3)
stacked translucent cards indicating weekly snapshots
signal_map.motion: Directional flow from outer visitor ring inward to loyalty core, with pulsing arcs to suggest short windows and shifting weight between promotion types.
signal_map.palette: Matte charcoal base, copper highlights, frosted acrylic planes and warm wood texture accents.
signal_map.alt: Abstract map of loyalty flows with pulsing arcs denoting short test windows.

case_studies.scene: Controlled cohort review table in a studio lab: low-angle 3/4 view, brushed steel table, printed AOV and conversion stacks for Nov15–Dec31 test.
case_studies.moment: Deciding whether 5% app cashback or 0% BNPL preserves conversion vs a straight 20% markdown; weekly cohort cards are being re-sorted to show substitution effects.
case_studies.persona: Brand analyst and finance-minded operator, collaborating with a studio producer to frame the narrative.
props: cohort cards labeled by week and promotion type (symbolic S1 tags)
product mockups and annotated P&L sticky notes
translucent card stack indicating deferred liability
case_studies.lighting: Polished editorial key light with confident highlights, soft fill, and clean negative space to emphasize hands and cards.
case_studies.alt: Brand and retail ops review cohort cards, symbolic pulse marks weekly cadence.

case_studies.scene: Pop-up setup rehearsal: overhead 45° angle, warm wood counter, branded signage mockups; operators map footfall to instant sign-up touchpoints.
case_studies.moment: Staging a 7–21 day pop-up that requires app sign-up at point of sale and planning measurement of sign-up conversion and 30-day repeat purchase.
case_studies.persona: Pop-up operator and field marketing lead working with a studio lighting tech to simulate day-to-day interaction.
props: loyalty signup mock cards and wristband-like tokens (symbolic S2)
sample receipts and on-site signage templates
visitor flow markers (tactile tape strips, without literal UI)
case_studies.lighting: Polished editorial side light with confident highlights on hands and tactile materials; clean background negative space.
case_studies.alt: Pop-up operator and studio partner set up loyalty signup flow, subtle timing pulse.

case_studies.scene: Early-access conversion moment in a staged pop-up alcove: tight crop, shallow depth, mixed materials (felt, frosted acrylic) to isolate the exchange.
case_studies.moment: Operator guides a visitor through a time-limited loyalty-only product release (Nov 15–22), converting visitors into members while capturing immediate AOV.
case_studies.persona: Retail floor operator and loyalty program coordinator collaborating with studio lead to capture the conversion moment.
props: small boxed limited-release product and loyalty membership token (symbolic S3)
week-tagged transaction slips and a translucent 'early access' placard
soft tactile queue elements (rope, mat) to imply limited access
case_studies.lighting: Polished editorial key highlight on subject faces and product, with generous negative space to keep focus on the exchange.
case_studies.alt: On-site early-access moment: operator guides visitor to loyalty sign-up; pulse hints urgency.
